comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: After 1891 (GPO clock etc)  before 1895 (Colonial Secretary's Office dome added) - see notes.

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Thanks Beachcomber, great to be able to narrow it to within four years :)
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons] Still trying to find the year ... not sure if "Intercolonial Boat Race" refers to the yachts or the rowing boats (which don't seem to be in any hurry).

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] It is unclear isn't it? As you say the rowers do not look to be in a hurry, however the numbered yachts in the background seem to be all following the same course - so our guess is that it refers to the yachts too.
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
